channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Kamala Harris Conspiracies Are Here
item.description: The far right is already spreading conspiracies about Vice President Kamala Harris after speculation that she may replace President Joe Biden as the D...

item.title: AT&T says criminals stole phone records of ‘nearly all’ customers in new data breach
item.description: The stolen data includes 110 million AT&T customer phone numbers, calling and text records, and some location-related data. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rig...

item.title: Google DeepMind's Chatbot-Powered Robot Is Part of a Bigger Revolution
item.description: Robotics researchers are exploring how large language models can give physical machines more smarts.

item.title: EU’s AI Act gets published in bloc’s Official Journal, starting clock on legal deadlines
item.description: The full and final text of the EU AI Act, the European Union’s landmark risk-based regulation for applications of artificial intelligence, has been pu...

item.title: Pressure Grows in Congress to Treat Crypto Investigator Tigran Gambaryan, Jailed in Nigeria, as a Hostage
item.description: A new resolution echoes what 16 members of Congress have already said to the White House: It must do more to free one of the most storied crypto-focus...

item.title: Waymo cameras capture footage of person charged in alleged robotaxi tire slashings
item.description: A Castro Valley resident was charged Thursday for allegedly slashing the tires of 17 Waymo robotaxis in San Francisco between June 24 and June 26, acc...

item.title: The 39 Best Shows on Max (aka HBO Max) Right Now (July 2024)
item.description: House of the Dragon, The Sopranos, and Fantasmas are just a few of the shows you need to be watching on Max this month.

item.title: SoftBank acquires UK AI chipmaker Graphcore

item.title: How Watermelon Cupcakes Kicked Off an Internal Storm at Meta
item.description: Arab and Muslim workers at Meta allege that its response to the crisis in Gaza is one-sided and out of hand. “It makes me sick that I work for this co...

item.title: X is building a ‘dislike’ button for downvoting replies
item.description: Elon Musk’s X, formerly Twitter, is continuing to develop a downvoting feature that will be used to improve how replies are ranked. Although the compa...
